hotelAmenitiesText.name: Property Amenities
hotelAmenitiesText.content:
Indulge in a treatment at the full-service spa.

Dining options at the resort.

Four Seasons Resort Vail is a smoke-free property.

  • Bar/lounge
  • Elevator/lift

hotelFeesText.name: Fees
hotelFeesText.content:
• The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.
    • Breakfast fee: between USD 10 and USD 30 per person (approximately)
    • Valet parking fee: USD 45 per night (in/out privileges)
  • The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.

hotelMandatoryFeesText.name: Mandatory Fees and Taxes
hotelMandatoryFeesText.content:
• The charges below are included in your overall room price:
    • Resort fee
  • The resort fee includes:
    • Fitness/yoga classes
    • Ski shuttle
    • Ski storage
    • Phone calls
    • In-room bottled water
    • Additional inclusions
  • We have included all charges provided to us by the property. However, charges can vary, for example, based on length of stay or the room you book.

hotelOverviewText.name: Location
hotelOverviewText.content: Located near the slopes, this Vail resort is within a 10-minute walk of Vail Valley Medical Center and Vail Ski Resort and close to winter sports such as cross-country skiing and snowshoeing. Betty Ford Alpine Gardens and Gerald R. Ford Amphitheater are also within 1 mi (2 km).

hotelOverviewText.name: Resort Features
hotelOverviewText.content: After a day on the slopes, return to Four Seasons Resort Vail to dine at the restaurant, drink at the bar/lounge, and enjoy comforts including an outdoor pool and a full-service spa.

hotelOverviewText.name: Room Amenities
hotelOverviewText.content: All 121 rooms boast fireplaces and deep soaking tubs, plus free WiFi and LCD TVs with cable channels. Guests will also find balconies or patios, iPod docks, and DVD players.

hotelPoliciesText.name: Policies
hotelPoliciesText.content:
• Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
  • Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
  • Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Check-in time starts at 4 PM
  • Check-out time is noon
  • American Express
  • No rollaway/extra beds available
  • No cribs (infant beds) available
  • Pets allowed
  • Diners Club
  • Discover
  • Pet maximum weight in lb is 20
  • Minimum check-in age is 18
  • JCB International
  • MasterCard
  • Visa
